title: *we're unable to log you in because you may be offline*
body:
This started from the PLAY button not working and wanted me to restart the client, to trying to sign in but I see "we're unable to log you in because you may be offline". I tried these steps: 
MAC:

1) Start and log onto League of Legends
2) Open Finder
3) Go to Applications
4) Right-click on League of Legends
5) Select Show Package Contents
6) Open Contents
7) Open LoL
8) Open Config
9) Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml
10) Open it with a text editor and and find gameflow-patcher-lock
11) Delete the whole line
12) Save file and restart the client

AND still the same issue is there. Please get back to me.

Thanks,
Bahd Mon{{champion:40}}

replies.body: Our tech team has received quite a few reports on this, and we believe there may be a bad node while routing.  Download our [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.  This will help us get an overview of how you're routing.  If we can find any blocks, you'll be able to use the logs to share with your ISP for further investigation.
